title: How to Make Tuna Pasta

steps.headline: Pour 1 tbsp of olive oil into a frying pan.
steps.description: turn the hob to medium heat and wait for the oil to get hot.

steps.headline: Add some chopped onion or chopped green onion in to the frying-pan with the oil and lightly sauté.
Add 1\2 a can of tuna and just under 1\2 a can of sweetcorn to the frying-pan.
Boil pasta according to package directions.
Once cooked, drain the pasta in a colander and leave to drain.
Put the pasta back into the pan.
Mix the tuna and sweetcorn mixture into the pasta until the pasta is evenly coated.
Stir in 2 tbsp of mayonnaise and mix well.
Season the pasta with salt and black pepper.

tyn: a bowl (to place the finished dinner)
a colander (to drain the pasta with)
text: Pour 1 tbsp of olive oil into a frying pan. turn the hob to medium heat and wait for the oil to get hot. Add some chopped onion or chopped green onion in to the frying-pan with the oil and lightly sauté.  Season with salt to taste.  Add 1\2 a can of tuna and just under 1\2 a can of sweetcorn to the frying-pan.  Lightly fry for about 30 seconds  Boil pasta according to package directions.  Once cooked, drain the pasta in a colander and leave to drain.  Put the pasta back into the pan.  Mix the tuna and sweetcorn mixture into the pasta until the pasta is evenly coated.  Stir in 2 tbsp of mayonnaise and mix well.  Season the pasta with salt and black pepper. (optional)
